message.body: Hey, sorry I haven't been in touch - Lego got hit by a car on Tuesday and I am a total sad disaster mess :( if you have time and don't mind potential bawling I would love to catch up, and no worries if not.
Omg! I'm so sorry! I'm leaving to travel for work right after Thanksgiving but I'll be in touch. If I was there I'd give you a big hug.
Thanks Merf. I am really feeling terrible about it. Where are you going?? I love your instagrams and request more.
I'll try to take lots of pics
Turkey is really high on my list of places to go. I hope you see lots of Byzantine shit!
